column4: hello i seem to be having a problem. i built a custom kernel from xen pvops sources. the problem seems to be now that i have enabled nouveau patches into the kernel image and built the kernel image + headers i cant seem to rebuild nouveau.ko in /usr/lib/modules/pvops.2.6 .......
.....even though nouveau.ko is in /usr/lib/modules/generic-2.6
because i didnt build nouveau.ko in make menuconfig as a module or into the kernel
is there a way i can just simply rebuild nouveau.ko for pvops.2.6 without having to recompile the entire kernel and rebuild?
as far as I know as long as the source in a link hasn't changed it won't recompile that part unless you do a make clean
that seems to make sense all of a sudden i did an rm -rf linux-2.6 and then git checkout but not a make clean.
it was odd because when i ran make (without menuconfig or oldconfig figuring the changes took effect it didnt even prompt me as usual)
you might be able to just change the config enable the new stuf and compile. it will find the change and compile and link it
so rm -rf linux-2.6/ then git checkout then cp -rf config then make clean? (should prompt me with a yes or no (single question) the way i have the config set as of current
as of current...it did a single yes or no when i ran make it didnt do it the second time after i didnt run make clean.
so if i presently run make clean it will make the new options hopefully?
oh I'm not sure I think you might need to go into the config editor and turn it on also
ok thanx i will give it another try if i am back in like 2 or 3 hours it will probably be because i cant see it in menuconfig or something.
yeah but i am not sure what to enable to make nouveau show up in the options of make menuconfig
nouveau is the for nvidia?
yeah.
I think I recall seeing nvidia support in menuconfig
i figured out why the option wasnt available i had to git remote add the driver source (as in the nouveau wiki) to /usr/src/pvops.2.6/    then menuconfig then enable it as <m> then make clean
thanx
was i talking to you the other day?
about nouveau in a custom kernel?
